events.question: [i]Do you want to hear the tutorial?[/i]

events.text: As I said before, they changed minecraft a lot since you last played so I'll teach you the basics, the order in which you collect speedrun items is still the same though.
[i]Mouse only[/i]. Click and hold anywhere on the map to make a CD connection with me. Release and I will give you a quick boost in the direction you're going.
I don't want the speedrun. com mods writing more essays so I'll only stay two seconds before fading away, [b]BUT[/b] you can have two copies of me on the map at the same time.
If you go too far out of view it's game over, unlucky. Time to beat is 20:37.346.
Oh the timer is already ticking, we should get going, good luck!
